Pre-Game Insights: Scotland win the toss and bat first.
Jos Buttler, England's captain, reckons he would have bowled first anyhow.
He's 'delighted' to have Jofra Archer back in his arsenal from injury.
England will be firm favourites, but Scotland are here to play, having progressed undefeated through the Europe Region Qualifier.
This is the first match between these sides in the T20I arena.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Michael Jones and George Munsey, who took their side to 90 without loss, scoring an unbeaten 45 and 41 respectively.
England's target from 10 overs on the DLS method after Scotland reached 90 without loss
The match was abandoned due to rain.
